com.enterprise_architecture.essential.importutility.service
Class DUPImportServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.enterprise_architecture.essential.importutility.service.DUPImportServiceImpl

public class DUPImportServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object

Class to implement the DUP service. Using the controller pattern, validates the request parameters where possible, creates a task for the requested import and sends it to the thread Executor to have it executed.

Author:
Jonathan Carter

Field Summary
static int INVALID_IMPORT_ACTIVITY
          Return code indicating that an invalid import activity was requested
static int INVALID_SOURCE_CONTENT
          Return code indicating that an invalid source content file was requested

static int INVALID_WORKSHEET
          Return code indicating that an invalid worksheet was requested
private  java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService itsExecutor
          ExecutorService managing a controlled threadpool and queue of tasks.
static int JOB_ACCEPTED
          Return code for successfully accepted new import job
static int JOB_NULL
          Return code indicating that the import job could not be accepted as it was null
static int JOB_REFUSED
          Return code indicating that the import job could not be accepted as the thread pool is fully committed.
private static int MAX_THREAD_POOL_SIZE
          Maximum number of threads in the thread pool
 
Constructor Summary

          Default constructor which initializes the thread pool.

executeImportJob

public int executeImportJob(java.lang.String impActName,
                            java.lang.String targetEnvName,
                            java.lang.String sourceFileName,
                            javax.servlet.ServletContext context,
                            java.lang.String responseURL,
                            java.lang.String IUUsername,
                            java.lang.String IUPassword,
                            java.lang.String batchID,
                            java.lang.String theTenantID,
                            java.lang.String theTenantUID,
                            java.lang.String theTenantPWD)
Submit a new Import Job to the controller. Jobs are queued until a thread in which to complete the job becomes available.

Parameters:
impActName -
targetEnvName -
sourceFileName -
context -
responseURL -
IUUsername -
IUPassword -
batchID -
theTenantID -

theTenantPWD -
